hints.content:
$\blueD{450}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $500$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 400 to 600 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 400, 450, 500, and 600 are labeled. The tick mark for 450 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{549}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $500$.

[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{450}$ to $\blueD{549}$ rounds to $500$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 400 to 600 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 400, 450, 500, 549, and 600 are labeled. The tick marks for 450 and 549 are blue. !

A number line labeled 400 to 600 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 400, 450, 500, 549, and 600 are labeled. The tick marks for 450 and 549 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 450 to the tick mark at 549. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $500$ if we are rounding to the nearest hundred?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 400 to 600 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 400, 450, 500, and 600 are labeled. The tick marks for 450 and 600 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 450 to the tick mark at 600.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b02e5844058360b645bc84f1561c79555cc060e)

![A number line labeled 400 to 600 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 400, 449, 500, 549, and 600 are labeled. The tick marks for 449 and 549 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 449 to the tick mark at 549.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/82306792fe74bfcf5a0f3eaef44ea699098c2a7a)

![A number line labeled 400 to 600 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 400, 450, 500, 549, and 600 are labeled. The tick marks for 450 and 549 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 450 to the tick mark at 549.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/68d3228f3e469259b6692ef4be6185c0ff0f3d83)
